"A.P.242/3/25/15:00": "You would likely lament this as a disappointing result."
"However, I am not worried. I have always sufficed on my own."
"Developing new weaponry, and sealing my powers with a barrier. The reluctance of the ARKS to surrender is most admirable."
"I shall show my respect for their efforts with a spectacular final battle. For this world. For the universe. For all of history."
"I am Shiva, Goddess of Demise. I am to bring about the demise of everything. And to that end, the erasure of all Photons."
"It is because we share this goal that you and I are together."
